summary: Completed comprehensive testing of POS System DateRangePicker and ConfigFunciones features. All 7 functions (including 3 new: Función de reloj, Impresoras de cocina, Pantalla para clientes) are working correctly. DateRangePicker with calendar, preset options, and navigation buttons fully functional.
passed_tests: Backend: PUT /api/funciones updates all 7 functions correctly
Backend: New functions (funcion_reloj, impresoras_cocina, pantalla_clientes) persist correctly
Backend: Dashboard API accepts date range parameters
Backend: Facturas API accepts date range parameters
Frontend: DateRangePicker trigger button with data-testid
Frontend: DateRangePicker popover opens with calendar
Frontend: All 8 preset date options displayed (Hoy, Ayer, Esta semana, La semana pasada, Este mes, Mes pasado, Últimos 7 días, Últimos 30 días)
Frontend: CANCELAR and HECHO buttons functional
Frontend: Date range selection with green highlighting
Frontend: Prev/Next date navigation buttons working
Frontend: Each function has icon, title, description, and toggle
Frontend: 3 new functions displayed with correct icons (Clock, Printer, Monitor)
Frontend: Toggle switches clickable and responsive
Frontend: Guardar cambios button saves configuration
Frontend: Cancelar button available for reset
critical_code_review_comments: DateRangePicker component well-structured with proper data-testid attributes
ConfigFunciones correctly maps all 7 functions with appropriate icons
Backend FuncionesConfig model includes all 7 boolean fields
API endpoints properly handle authentication and organization context
seed_data_creation: None required - used existing admin account
context_for_next_testing_agent: DateRangePicker and ConfigFunciones features fully tested and working. All 7 functions (4 original + 3 new) are properly integrated. The DateRangePicker uses react-day-picker with Spanish locale and has 8 preset date range options. Backend pytest tests created in /app/tests/test_funciones_api.py covering all funciones API endpoints.
